mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, tt.* FROM (SELECT bno,title,nickname,writeUserSeq,productname,img, price,quantity,location,content,to_char(dateWrite, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateWrite,to_char(dateStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateStart,to_char(dateEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateEnd, requestUserSeq,requestUsername, con from purchase order by bno desc) tt) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT bno,title,nickname,username,writeUserSeq,productname,img, price,quantity,location,content,to_char(dateWrite, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateWrite,to_char(dateStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateStart,to_char(dateEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dateEnd, requestUserSeq,requestUsername, con from purchase where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update purchase set title=#{title}, productname=#{productname}, price=#{price}, quantity =#{quantity}, location=#{location}, dateStart=#{dateEnd},dateEnd=#{dateEnd},content=#{content}, dateWrite=sysdate where bno =#{bno}
update purchase set title=#{title}, location=#{location}, dateStart=#{dateStart},dateEnd=#{dateEnd},content=#{content}, dateWrite=sysdate where bno =#{bno}
update purchaseorder set is_permit=#{isPermit} where prno=#{prno}
update purchaserequest set is_permit=#{isPermit} where prno=#{prno}
